topic_coverage.summary: Focus on personal habits, social rules, travel, and cultural comparisons.

categories.name: Category 1: Man & Self (Lifestyle & Growth)
sub_topics: Healthy Living (Balanced Diet, Exercise, First Aid)
Personal Habits (Good vs Bad habits, Time management)
My Dream Job (Future intentions, Role models)
example_prompts: A Bad Habit I Want to Break

categories.name: Category 2: Man & Society (Interaction & Rules)
sub_topics: Volunteering (Helping at animal hospitals, Food banks)
example_prompts: A Letter of Advice to a Friend

categories.name: Category 3: Man & Nature (Exploration)
example_prompts: How to Protect Ourselves in an Earthquake

categories.name: Category 4: Culture & Stories
sub_topics: Folk Tales (Yu Gong Moves a Mountain, Monkey King)
example_prompts: Differences Between Chinese and Western Food

vocabulary.level_requirement: Proficiency in 800-1200 words. Express opinions and plans clearly.
phrase_bank: used to do / be used to doing
turn down / turn up / turn off

complex_structures: Past Simple vs. Past Continuous (was doing when...)
If-Conditionals (First Conditional: If it rains, I will...)
Infinitive as Object/Subject (warn sb. to do sth., It's important to do...)
Adverbial Clauses of Time/Reason (When / While / Before / After / Because)
grammar_focus.sentence_variety: Use of complex sentences with 'If', 'Unless', 'Although'. Using 'It is + adj + to do'.

writing_standards.structure: Clear Introduction -> 2-3 Body Paragraphs (Logical sequence) -> Conclusion.
writing_standards.cohesion: Use transition words: First of all, What's more, In addition, However, Finally.
writing_standards.scoring_points: Logic, correct tense usage (especially Past vs Future), vocabulary variety.
